title: Helena
overview: Helena Rosselli is very captivating character. A very dynamic journalist-detective, alert, shrewd, but also very fragile and sensitive. After all, she is a simple and gentle girl, who tries to get close to others and understand them. Often she remains involved in the stories and lives "yellow" situations that make the story always full of suspense and interest. The series is based on a comic book written and illustrated by Robin Wood and Garda Seijas.
